attributes.action: Stop the rollout of E10 petrol!
attributes.additional_details:
Do not bring out the E10 fuel!! 

At least if its going to happen give people that option to have what they've been using for years because where all not rich so we carn't afford a nice new fancy car. We like owr old cars better!
attributes.background: Stop the rollout of E10 petrol as its dangerous on older cars and could cause blockages, even corrosion. Older cars are far more cheap to buy and not everyone has that kind of money for modern cars and to add to that as a general public we all prefer classic cars over an modern car!

rejection.details:
If your petrol vehicle or equipment is not compatible with E10 fuel, you will still be able to use E5 by purchasing the ‘super’ grade (97+ octane) petrol from most filling stations.

Find out more about changes to petrol standards here: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/e10-petrol-explained
